The project includes simulated data for a set of 1000 and 60 000 points provided by Darren Mayne, darren.mayne@sesiahs.health.nsw.gov.au.  The code should work with any set of geocodes that are put into the dataprovided folder and referred to in the main.R script. </td> </tr>
